 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֹחַ‎</span><sub>46</sub> **proper name, masculine** ==Noah== (Nabataean proper name <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוח‎</span> [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>322</sup>, Syriac proper name <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#Meissn|Meissn]]<sup>VOJ viii, (1894), 303 near the end</sup> (No. 116)); — [[Gen.5.29|Gen 5:29]] (where traditional etymology), + 40 t. Gen 5-10 (not in [[BDB#E|E]] [[BDB#D|D]]); [[1Chr.1.4|1Chr 1:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֹחַ דָּנִאֵל וְאִיּוֺב‎</span> [[Ezek.14.14|Ezek 14:14]]; [[Ezek.14.20|Ezek 14:20]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵי נֹחַ‎</span> = flood [[Isa.54.9|Isa 54:9]] (twice in verse); [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">Νωε</span>. — On history of interpretion of name see Goldziher<sup>ZMG xxiv. (1870), 207 ff</sup>.
